item.title: Here are our PlayStation Plus Game Catalogue and retro titles for August
item.content:encoded:
Mortal Kombat, Spider-Man, Sword of the Sea, Resident Evil 2 and more.

Sony has announced the line-up of games coming to the PlayStation Plus Game Catalogue this August. Available to PS Plus Extra and Premium members, these new additions include Mortal Kombat 1, Marvel's Spider-Man, Sword of the Sea, Earth Defense Force 6, and Unicorn Overlord.

Sword of the Sea launches day one into the PlayStation Plus Game Catalogue. As the latest game from Giant Squid, the studio behind The Pathless and Abzu, it arrives with high expectations.

Also arriving this month, only for Premium members, are the PlayStation versions of Resident Evil 2 and 3. While both of these games have been completely remade for modern systems, these PlayStation originals will give you an authentic look at what survival horror was like back on Sony's first console.

  • Resident Evil 3: Nemesis | PS5, PS4 (PS)

All new additions will be available from 19th August.
